message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer for it?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I believe I can offer you $100 for the product.
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $135. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really get a lot of value out of this product. What do you think?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I would like to stick to my original offer of $100. I am confident that this is a fair price for the product.

I understand you're sticking to your original offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm thinking more along the lines of $130. It's a fair price, considering the value this product will bring to you. What do you think?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $110 for the product.

I appreciate your counteroffer, Bob, but I'm still a bit above $110. I'm thinking more along the lines of $140. It's a great price, considering the value this product will bring to you. What do you think?
Hello Alice, I understand your position, but I would like to stick to my previous counteroffer of $110. I believe this is a fair price for the product.
